titles.title: Honoring the accomplishments and charitable contributions of Peter Morgan Alonso of the New York Mets upon his being named the National League Jackie Robinson Rookie of the Year.
Honoring the accomplishments and charitable contributions of Peter Morgan Alonso of the New York Mets upon his being named the National League Jackie Robinson Rookie of the Year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the accomplishments and example of Peter Morgan Alonso of the New York Mets and honors him for his record-breaking year and commitment to his community.
